violationsByInspectionidList.name: Moses Field School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A test kit or other device that accurately measures the concentration in mg/L of SANITIZING solutions shall be provided. (Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Moses Field School
violationsByInspectionidList.subItem: of premises for evidence of pests
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Inspections must be performed as stated above.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Moses Field School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Moses Field School
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Dead or trapped birds, insects, rodents, and other pests shall be removed from control devices and the PREMISES at a frequency that prevents their accumulation,  decomposition, or the attraction of pests.
